titleInfo.title: File 4613/1919 Pt 4 'MESOPOTAMIA: LAND TENURE – MISCELLEANOUS ENQUIRIES RE ACQUISITION OF LAND'

mods.abstract: This item consists of part four of the subject file 4613/1919 Iraq: Land Tenure. It concerns British land policy in the occupied territories of Mesopotamia [Iraq], particularly in relation to the purchase of land for cultivation. The part consists almost entirely of letters received by the India Office and the Foreign Office from private individuals, many of whom are British army officers, expressing a personal interest in purchasing land in Mesopotamia and requesting further information on the subject.
